en.INTERNET_DISCONNECTED:
Desculpe, parece que nós não estamos conseguindo conectar aos servidores do Jackbox Games.
Por favor, verifique se sua conexão à internet está funcionando corretamente.
en.ROOM_DESTROYED:
Desculpe, ocorreu um erro na conexão e sua sala foi destruida.
Por favor, verifique se sua conexão à internet está funcionando corretamente.
en.ROOM_EXIT_CAUSE_LOBBY_TIMEOUT:
Desculpe, ocorreu um erro na conexão e sua sala foi destruida.
Por favor, verifique se sua conexão à internet está funcionando corretamente. (Motivo: 1)
en.ROOM_EXIT_CAUSE_JOIN_TIMEOUT:
Desculpe, ocorreu um erro na conexão e sua sala foi destruida.
Por favor, verifique se sua conexão à internet está funcionando corretamente. (Motivo: 2)
en.ROOM_EXIT_CAUSE_GAME_TIMEOUT:
Desculpe, ocorreu um erro na conexão e sua sala foi destruida.
Por favor, verifique se sua conexão à internet está funcionando corretamente. (Motivo: 3)
en.ROOM_EXIT_CAUSE_DISCONNECT:
Desculpe, ocorreu um erro na conexão e sua sala foi destruida.
Por favor, verifique se sua conexão à internet está funcionando corretamente. (Motivo: 4)
en.ROOM_EXIT_CAUSE_BY_REQUEST:
Desculpe, ocorreu um erro na conexão e sua sala foi destruida.
Por favor, verifique se sua conexão à internet está funcionando corretamente. (Motivo: 5)
en.ROOM_EXIT_CAUSE_SHUTTING_DOWN:
Desculpe, ocorreu um erro na conexão e sua sala foi destruida.
Por favor, verifique se sua conexão à internet está funcionando corretamente. (Motivo: 6)
en.SOCKET_DISCONNECTED: Desculpe, você perdeu sua conexão com os servidores do Jackbox Games.
en.TIMEOUT:
Desculpe, não estamos conseguindo conectar aos servidores do Jackbox Games.
Por favor, verifique se sua conexão à internet está funcionando corretamente.
en.USER_DISCONNECT: Desculpe, você foi desconectado pelo servidor. Por favor, tente novamente.
en.LOST_LICENSE: Desculpe, nós perdemos a licensa para esse conteúdo!
en.STEAM_ERROR: Desculpe, nós não conseguimos validar a sua licensa STEAM.
en.TWITCH_PRIME_ERROR: Desculpe, nós não conseguimos validar a sua inscrição Prime da Twitch.
en.LOST_DLC: Desculpe, a licensa para a sua DLC não foi encontrada. Voltando para o menu...
en.PLAY_DESCRIPTION: Crie uma sala de jogos e jogue
en.TMI_DESCRIPTION: Jogue um novo modo totalmente voltado para os jogadores
en.CONNECTING: Conectando-se aos serviços da Jackbox Games
en.CONNECTING_DELAY:
Isso está demorando um pouco...
Verifique sua conexão com a Internet.
en.JOIN_ON_YOUR_DEVICE: no seu dispositivo móvel para participar
en.ENTER_ROOM_CODE: e digite o código do quarto
en.SKIP_PROMPT: Do you want to skip the intro?
en.INTRO_1: You have traveled to this sacred mountaintop...
en.INTRO_2: Seeking answers from the all-knowing Wheel of Enormous Proportions
en.INTRO_3: You may now ask The Wheel any one question that torments your very soul
en.INTRO_4: Will you ask the same question or submit a new one?
en.INTRO_5: The leader of your group has decided that each of you shall be given an important question.
en.INTRO_6: Should you win the game, your unique question will be answered, and your life forever changed.
en.GUESSING_PROMPT: What do you think The Wheel is talking about?
en.TRIVIA_TYPE_TAPPING_LIST_INSTRUCTIONS: Tap the answers that fit the prompt on your device
en.TRIVIA_TYPE_SUBJECTIVE_LIST_INSTRUCTIONS: Guess as many answers as you can before time runs out
en.TRIVIA_TYPE_TYPING_LIST_INSTRUCTIONS: Type as many answers as you can before time runs out
en.TRIVIA_TYPE_NUMBER_TARGET_INSTRUCTIONS: Submit a number as close to the correct answer as you can
en.TRIVIA_TYPE_RAPID_FIRE_INSTRUCTIONS: Tap as many correct answers as you can before time runs out
en.TRIVIA_TYPE_MATCHING_INSTRUCTIONS: Match as many correct answers as you can before time runs out
en.TRIVIA_TYPE_GUESSING_INSTRUCTIONS: Guess what the wheel is thinking on your device
en.ASK_THE_WHEEL_PROMPT: You may now ask The Wheel of Enormous Proportions one question
en.SLICE_EFFECT_SWAPPOINTS_DESCRIPTION: Make two other players swap points
en.SLICE_EFFECT_SWAPPOINTS_PROMPT: Choose two players. They will swap points.
en.SLICE_EFFECT_EXPAND_DESCRIPTION: Duplicate a slice over top the slices next to it
en.SLICE_EFFECT_EXPAND_PROMPT: Choose a slice. It will duplicate over top the slices next to it
en.SLICE_EFFECT_REPLACESLICE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a slice to make it all your own
en.SLICE_EFFECT_REPLACESLICE_PROMPT: Choose a slice. It will become your very own new slice
en.SLICE_EFFECT_STEALFROMPLAYERSLICE_DESCRI: Steal points from everyone on a slice
en.SLICE_EFFECT_STEALFROMPLAYERSLICE_PROMPT: Choose a slice. Everyone on that slice gives you points
en.SLICE_EFFECT_RAINBOW_DESCRIPTION: Spin as many times as you can!
en.SLICE_EFFECT_RAINBOW_PROMPT: Spin as many times as you can!
en.SLICE_EFFECT_CONSENSUSCHALLENGE_DESCRIPT: You win the pot again unless everyone agrees to give it to someone else
en.SLICE_EFFECT_CONSENSUSCHALLENGE_PROMPT: Choose a player. %s will win the pot again unless everyone agrees to give it to someone else
en.SLICE_EFFECT_CATCHMECHALLENGE_DESCRIPTIO: You win the pot again if no one picks the same slice that you do
en.SLICE_EFFECT_CATCHMECHALLENGE_PROMPT_SLI: Choose a slice. You win the pot again if no one picks the slice that you do
en.SLICE_EFFECT_CATCHMECHALLENGE_PROMPT_NON: Choose a slice. %s will win the pot again if no one picks the slice that they pick
en.SLICE_EFFECT_CHAINSTEAL_DESCRIPTION: Steal a set of linked slices that belong to another player
en.SLICE_EFFECT_CHAINSTEAL_PROMPT: Choose a slice. You will steal a set of linked slices that belong to another player.
en.AUDIENCE_CHOOSE_TRIVIA_WINNER_PROMPT_0: Which player is going to do best on this question?
en.SLICE_EFFECT_AUDIENCEREPLACESLICES_DESCR: Everyone vote now on your device
en.SLICE_EFFECT_AUDIENCEREPLACESLICES_PROMP: Do you want more POWER SLICES or more SKULL SLICES?
en.SLICE_EFFECT_AUDIENCENUMSPINS_DESCRIPTIO: Everyone vote now on your device
en.SLICE_EFFECT_AUDIENCENUMSPINS_PROMPT: Do you want the Spin Meter to be FULL or RESET?
en.SLICE_EFFECT_AUDIENCE_NEIGHBOR_BONUS_DES: Everyone vote now on your device
en.SLICE_EFFECT_AUDIENCE_NEIGHBOR_BONUS_PRO: Should players next to a Power Slice GET POINTS or LOSE POINTS?
en.SLICE_EFFECT_AUDIENCE_NEIGHBOR_BAD_DESCR: Everyone vote now on your device
en.SLICE_EFFECT_AUDIENCE_NEIGHBOR_BAD_PROMP: Should players next to a Skull Slice GET POINTS or LOSE POINTS?
en.SLICE_EFFECT_AUDIENCESLICECOUNT_DESCRIPT: Everyone vote now on your device
en.SLICE_EFFECT_AUDIENCESLICECOUNT_PROMPT: Should I give points to the player with the MOST slices or the FEWEST slices?
en.SLICE_EFFECT_AUDIENCESKULLSWAPPER_DESCRI: Everyone vote now on your device
en.SLICE_EFFECT_AUDIENCESKULLSWAPPER_PROMPT: Should I Skull up the SINGLE player slices or the SHARED slices?
en.SLICE_EFFECT_AUDIENCESLICEENHANCEMENT_DE: Everyone vote now on your device
en.SLICE_EFFECT_AUDIENCESLICEENHANCEMENT_PR: Should Player Slices be worth MORE or should I MIX them all up instead?
en.CREDITS_UNANSWERED_HEADER: QUESTIONS THAT MAY NEVER BE ANSWERED
en.CREDITS_THEME_0: Look in the sky, about one-thousand miles high
en.CREDITS_THEME_1: It’s the Wheel of Enormous Proportions
en.CREDITS_THEME_2: A super deity, taller than the highest tree
en.CREDITS_THEME_3: It’s the Wheel of Enormous Proportions
en.CREDITS_THEME_6: Hope you’re really good at trivia
en.CREDITS_THEME_7: And with a spin of its face
en.CREDITS_THEME_8: Maybe it lands upon your space
en.CREDITS_THEME_9: Fulfilling all your dreams beyond compare
en.CREDITS_THEME_11: Round and round the wheel goes
en.CREDITS_THEME_12: Where it’ll land, no one knows
en.CREDITS_THEME_14: At any moment, anyone can win
en.CREDITS_THEME_15: But with the Wheel of E.P.
en.CREDITS_THEME_17: It bestows upon you answers that you seek
en.CREDITS_THEME_18: So travel on high, to the hero in the sky
en.CREDITS_THEME_19: It’s the Wheel of Enormous Proportions
en.CREDITS_THEME_20: You’ll get more answers there, than you’ll find most anywhere
en.CREDITS_THEME_21: With the Wheel of Enormous Proportions
